facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under 5 years of age fell from 14.9 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 7.4 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 87.12 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in mathematics by the end of primary education
facts.fact_text: The gender parity index for achievement in mathematics at the end of primary education was 1.17 in 2015 , meaning 117.0 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in mathematics.

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in reading by the end of primary education
facts.fact_text: The gender parity index for achievement in reading at the end of primary education was 1.5 in 2015 , meaning 150.0 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in reading.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 5.26 % in 2000 to 11.11% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 90.07 % in 2000 to 97.35% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, more than 95 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita declined from 4.45 % in 2000 to 1.97% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 5.36 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 2.72 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate of population 15 years of age and older
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate was 8.42 % in 2001.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 99.0 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) was about 17.92 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 5.36 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 2.72 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 0.16 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of land area covered by forest was approximately 22.27 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 14.87 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2012, the intentional homicide rate was 10.33 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances as a proportion of total GCP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the inflow of personal remittances was 2.01 % of GDP, down from 2.73 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 8.82 % of the population, up from 1.88% of the population in 2004.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of national statistical plans that are fully funded
facts.fact_text: As of 2018, Antigua and Barbuda has developed national statistical plans that are fully funded.
